<traits>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The luminous design of red-orange cracks on this black obsidian wand suggests cooling lava.

<document level="2" id="action-1837" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _flaming sphere_ of the appropriate level.

</column>
